com.azure.data.cosmos.internal.changefeed

Interface LeaseStoreManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LeaseCheckpointer, LeaseContainer, LeaseManager, LeaseStore

    public interface LeaseStoreManager
extends LeaseContainer, LeaseManager, LeaseStore, LeaseCheckpointer
    Defines an interface for operations with Lease.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  LeaseStoreManager.LeaseStoreManagerBuilderDefinition
      Provides flexible way to build lease manager constructor parameters.

      • acquireInitializationLock

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> acquireInitializationLock(Duration lockExpirationTime)
        Places a lock on the lease store for initialization. Only one process may own the store for the lock time.
        Specified by:
        acquireInitializationLock in interface LeaseStore
        Parameters:
        lockExpirationTime - the time for the lock to expire.
        Returns:
        true if the lock was acquired, false otherwise.

      • releaseInitializationLock

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> releaseInitializationLock()
        Releases the lock one the lease store for initialization.
        Specified by:
        releaseInitializationLock in interface LeaseStore
        Returns:
        true if the lock was acquired and was relesed, false if the lock was not acquired.
